name: Help Won't Come
description:
You woke up in an unknown space ship full of monsters. Can you find the exit and survive?

Main features:

  • Drone mechanic. Use your drone to fight with enemies! 
  • 35+ items with different effects!
  • Item synergies!
  • Around 10 different enemies!
  • 1 boss! (will be more in next updates)
  • Shops!

Plans for updates:

  • Even more items and enemies
  • More rooms
  • More levels
  • More bosses
  • Music and sounds
  • Main menu
  • Achievements and unlockables
